  <script type="text/javascript">
   if (window.location.hash &amp;&amp; window.location.hash == '#_=_') {
        window.location.hash = '';
    }
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
    })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-37066016-1', 'muhlenberg.edu');
    var pageTitle = "Catering Home";
    if (pageTitle == 'Error Page') {
        /* Track generic Errors */
        var url = "/error/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '404 Error Page') {
        /* Track 404 Errors */
        var url = "/404/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '500 Error Page') {
        /* Track 500 Errors */
        var url = "/500/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else {
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    }
    /**
    * Function that tracks a click on an outbound link in Google Analytics.
    * This function takes a valid URL string as an argument, and uses that URL string
    * as the event label. Setting the transport method to 'beacon' lets the hit be sent
    * using 'navigator.sendBeacon' in browser that support it.
    */
    var trackOutboundLink = function (url) {
        ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {
            'transport': 'beacon'
        });
    }
    $(function () {
        $('a[href*="http://"], a[href*="https://"]').each(function (index) {
            var currentOnClick = $(this).attr("onclick");
            if (currentOnClick === undefined || currentOnClick === null || currentOnClick === "") {
                var href = $(this).attr("href");
                $(this).attr("onclick", "trackOutboundLink('" + href + "');");
            }
        });
    });
  </script>
 </head>
 <body>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
            $("#tabs").tabs();
            $("#register").click(function () {
                $("#login-fields").hide();
                $("#create-new").show();
                //            alert("Clicked register");
            });
            $("#already-registered").click(function () {
                $("#create-new").hide();
                $("#login-fields").show();
                //            alert("Clicked Already Registered");
            });
            $("#SignIn").click(
                function () {
                });
            //variable to reference window
            $myWindow = $('#openid-box');
            //instantiate the dialog
            $myWindow.dialog({
                height: 550,
                width: 700,
                modal: true,
                position: 'center',
                autoOpen: false,
                title: 'Join us - It\'s Free!!!',
                beforeclose: function (event) { return $("dlgclose"); }
            });
            $("#dayFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventToday");
            });
            $("#weekFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventWeek");
            });
            $("#monthFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = '';
            });   
            var last = $("#nav #nav-stripe ul.pureCssMenu.pureCssMenum li.pureCssMenui0:last");
            last.hover(
		  function () {
		      var viewArea = $(window).width();
		      var offset = last.offset();
		      var outer = offset.left + 155;
		      var diff = "-88px"; //(viewArea - outer) + 'px';
		      if (viewArea &lt; outer) {
		          $(this).find("ul").css("left", diff);
		      }
		  },
		  function () {
		      $(this).find("ul").css("left", "0px");
		  }
	);
            //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing... 
        });
        //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing...
  </script>

   <div id="header-txt">
    By protecting and improving our environment, the communities where we do business and the students we serve, Muhlenberg Dining makes every day a better day and every tomorrow a better tomorrow.
   </div>

     $(document).ready(function () {
            $('#iview').show();

                pauseTime: 6000,
                directionNav: false,
                fx: "fade",
                    tooltipY: -15,
                    timer: "Bar",
                    pauseOnHover: "false",
                    controlNav: "true"
                });

    <div class="main-corners">
     <div class="">
      <div id="tcm1703-2100">
       <div id="sustContainer">
        <h1>
         Red Door Catering
        </h1>
        <div>
         <p>
          <img title="catering logo" alt="catering logo" style="width: 155px; height: 152px;" src="/Images/catering-logo_tcm1703-58352.png" />
          <img title="Catering_Crab_Cakes" alt="Catering_Crab_Cakes" style="width: 300px; height: 300px;" class="logos" src="/Images/crab-cakes-cl-1665282-l_tcm1703-113428.jpg" />
          Red Door Catering at Muhlenberg College strives to provide fresh, creative and appetizing food with hospitality, warmth and welcome that the red door signifies. Our guide incorporates a wide range of menus and styles of services that are continually updated throughout the year with seasonal offerings. Our team of talented professionals provides events with skilled staff that are capable and responsive. 
         </p>
         <p>
          We look forward to delivering a great event for you, your clients and your guests! 
         </p>
         <p>
          <strong>
           If you are planning an on campus event, the first step is is to
           <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/main/aboutus/union/internal.html" target="_blank">
            request facilities and resources
           </a>
           .
          </strong>
           
         </p>
         <p>
          To book catering for your event, after your space reservation have been approved, please call our main office at (484) 664-3488 and we would be happy to accommodate your request.
         </p>
         <ul>
          <li>
           <strong>
            <a target="_blank" title="Red-Door-Catering-Guide.pdf" href="/Images/Red-Door-Catering-Guide_tcm1703-51570.pdf">
             Red Door Catering Guide
            </a>
            :
           </strong>
           <br />
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCWelcome.pdf" href="/Images/RDCWelcome_tcm1703-51890.pdf">
            Welcome Page
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCPoliciesandProcedures.pdf" href="/Images/RDCPoliciesandProcedures_tcm1703-51886.pdf">
            Policies &amp; Procedures
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCMorningFare.pdf" href="/Images/RDCMorningFare_tcm1703-51885.pdf">
            Morning Fare
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCLunchDinnerBuffets.pdf" href="/Images/RDCLunchDinnerBuffets_tcm1703-51883.pdf">
            Lunch/Dinner Buffets
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCPresetPlatedLunchDinner.pdf" href="/Images/RDCPresetPlatedLunchDinner_tcm1703-51887.pdf">
            Preset Lunch/Dinner Meals
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCServedLunchDinner.pdf" href="/Images/RDCServedLunchDinner_tcm1703-51888.pdf">
            Served Lunch/Dinner Meals
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCCarvingChefPres.pdf" href="/Images/RDCCarvingChefPres_tcm1703-51880.pdf">
            Carving Stations &amp; Chef Presentations
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCHorsDoeuvres.pdf" href="/Images/RDCHorsDoeuvres_tcm1703-51882.pdf">
            Hors D'oeuvres
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCGrabNGoBoxedMeals.pdf" href="/Images/RDCGrabNGoBoxedMeals_tcm1703-51881.pdf">
            Grab &amp; Go Boxed Meals
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCMeetingPackages.pdf" href="/Images/RDCMeetingPackages_tcm1703-51884.pdf">
            Meeting Packages
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCBeverageService.pdf" href="/Images/RDCBeverageService_tcm1703-51878.pdf">
            Beverage Service
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCBreaks.pdf" href="/Images/RDCBreaks_tcm1703-51879.pdf">
            Break Packages
           </a>
           |
           <a target="_blank" title="RDCSushi.pdf" href="/Images/RDCSushi_tcm1703-51889.pdf">
            Sushi
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a target="_blank" title="No-Frills-Catering-Guide.pdf" href="/Images/No-Frills-Catering-Guide_tcm1703-51568.pdf">
            No Frills (budget friendly) Catering Guide
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a target="_blank" title="Kosher-Full-Service-Menu.pdf" href="/Images/Kosher-Full-Service-Menu_tcm1703-51562.pdf">
            Kosher Catering Guide
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <div>
          <br />
         </div>
         <div>
          <strong>
           Fall 2016 Catering Limited  Time Offers
          </strong>
         </div>
         <div>
          <div>
           Our talented culinary team has taken advantage of the flavors of fall by creating delightfully new dishes featuring the best of the season. These delicious dishes are available only for a limited time.
          </div>
         </div>
         <div>
          <a target="_blank" title="Fall 16 Catering LTOs" href="/Images/Autumn_Flavors_F16_tcm1703-120025.pdf">
           Please click here to view our Fall 2016 LTO menu.
          </a>
         </div>
         <h2>
          Meal Credit for Catered Events
         </h2>
         <ul>
          <li>
           <a target="_blank" title="Meal-Credit-Catered-Events.pdf" href="/Images/Meal-Credit-Catered-Events_tcm1703-51564.pdf">
            Meal Credit for Catered Events Policy
           </a>
            
          </li>
          <li>
           Meal Credit for Catered Events Form Please submit to
           <a href="mailto:catering@muhlenberg.edu">
            catering@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
       <script type="text/javascript" src="https://images.sodexomyway.com/js/catering-lto.js">
       </script>
       <div class="lto" data-keyword="">
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="column-33 float-right" style="display:none">
      <div id="loggedin">
       <span id="span_loggedin">
       </span>
      </div>
